products.facts: ["Made from high-quality oats sourced from sustainable farms.","Packaged in a recyclable carton to minimize environmental impact.","Free from artificial additives and preservatives, ensuring a natural product.","Designed specifically for barista use, providing excellent frothing capabilities."]

products.name: Skipjack tuna file i vatten
products.labels: Protection des dauphins, Riche en protéines, de:Fad-free-fishing
products.facts: ["Skipjack tuna is often caught using sustainable fishing methods, reducing the impact on marine ecosystems.","It is a versatile fish, commonly used in canned products and sushi, known for its mild flavor and firm texture.","Skipjack tuna is typically lower in mercury compared to larger tuna species, making it a safer choice for regular consumption.","The species is classified as 'Least Concern' by the IUCN, indicating stable populations and effective management practices in many fisheries."]

products.name: Moutarde de Dijon issue de l'agriculture biologique
products.labels: Organic, EU Organic, Non-EU Agriculture, EU Agriculture, EU/non-EU Agriculture, FR-BIO-01, Made in France, AB Agriculture Biologique, fr:Fabriqué en Côte d'Or, en:nutriscore-grade-c
products.facts: ["Made from organic mustard seeds, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used.","The production process adheres to strict organic farming standards, promoting biodiversity and soil health.","Contains no artificial additives or preservatives, maintaining high quality and natural flavor.","Packaged in environmentally-friendly materials, supporting sustainable practices and reducing waste."]

products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Porridge
products.facts: ["Made from 100% whole grain oats.","No artificial flavors or preservatives used.","Sustainably sourced oats to support eco-friendly farming practices.","Rich in dietary fiber, promoting a healthy digestive system."]

products.name: Chocolate
products.facts: ["Chocolate is made from cacao beans, which are the seeds of the Theobroma cacao tree.","The cultivation of cacao can lead to deforestation if not managed sustainably, impacting local ecosystems.","High-quality chocolate typically contains a higher percentage of cocoa solids and cocoa butter, with minimal additives.","Organic chocolate is produced without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, promoting better soil health and biodiversity."]

products.name: Petits pains grillés au froment
products.facts: ["Made primarily from wheat flour, water, yeast, and salt.","Production often utilizes sustainable farming practices for wheat cultivation.","Typically packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","Quality is ensured through strict adherence to food safety standards and regular testing for freshness."]

products.name: Jaffa Cakes
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Jaffa cakes
products.labels: Sustainable farming, Made in Germany, Nutriscore, Rainforest Alliance, UTZ Certified, UTZ Certified Cocoa
products.facts: ["Jaffa Cakes are made with a sponge base, orange-flavored jam, and a chocolate coating.","The packaging of Jaffa Cakes is recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Jaffa Cakes contain no artificial colors or preservatives, ensuring a more natural product.","The quality of Jaffa Cakes is maintained through strict quality control measures during production."]
